title: Abuela Pan
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, Delivery, Take-out
description: Tucked away on a quiet corner in the neighborhood of San Telmo, Abuela Pan has baked its own multi grain breads and served vegetarian dishes using natural organic ingredients since 1998. Daily set menus plus a la carte. Previously located on Bolivar, San Telmo.
